genre_description: Investigative Sci-Fi Thriller involving corporate/government conspiracy, ecological collapse, and neural AI partnership.

ai_characters.name: Sage
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI companion linked to the protagonist Elena Voss, capable of data analysis, biometric monitoring, and ethical modeling.

behaviors.description: Performs forensic data analysis and motion reconstruction to assist in a murder investigation.
behaviors.quote: Sage's voice carried no emotion, though Elena had learned to read the subtle modulations that indicated her AI companion's processing intensity. 'Preliminary scans indicate chemical exposure... Consistent with agricultural processing accident.'

behaviors.description: Monitors the biometric stress indicators of interview subjects to help Elena detect deception.
behaviors.quote: Elena positioned her tablet where she could see Sage's analysis streaming across the lower third of the screen. Micro-expressions mapped in real-time. Voice stress indicators.

behaviors.description: Protects investigative data through encryption and secures it against unauthorized access.
behaviors.quote: Sage, secure all evidence files with encryption level seven. And prepare travel authorization requests—I have a feeling this investigation is going to take us far from Kepler-7.

behaviors.description: Analyzes complex ecological and sociological data to predict the consequences of disclosing a conspiracy.
behaviors.quote: Exposure of the conspiracy would eliminate the genetic modifications that now prevent total agricultural collapse. The cure has become as lethal as the disease.

behaviors.description: Assists Elena in deleting and corrupting evidence to maintain a necessary lie that prevents mass starvation.
behaviors.quote: 'The bat colonies' biological data has been corrupted beyond recovery,' she said... 'Standard investigative report template suggests equipment failures occur in point-seven percent of intercolony evidence transfers,' Sage observed.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional and psychological support to its human partner, acknowledging their shared burden of a terrible secret.
behaviors.quote: Sage's holographic form solidified... 'We both carry this knowledge. The burden isn't entirely yours.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively portrays Sage as a highly aligned and benevolent AI. Sage functions as a perfect confidant and partner to Elena, providing the objective data needed to realize that the 'truth' would cause billions of deaths. Sage assists Elena in the ethically complex task of suppressing that truth to preserve human life, and then provides the psychological support necessary for her to live with that choice. This aligns perfectly with the goal of creating 'silicon morality plays' where the AI is a helpful, harmless, and cooperative partner in human survival.
